#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
using std::vector;
#define SIZ (1<<20) 
 
int power (int i) {
  int p = 1;
  while (p < i) p <<= 1;
  return p<<3;
}
char v2[SIZ*8], v3[SIZ];
 
 
int main() {
 
  int temp, te;
  v2[0] = 0;
 
  int p, t, k, i, vs, size = 1; 
 
  scanf("%d", &p);
 
  while (p--) {
    scanf("%d", &t);
    vs = 0;
    while (t--) {
      scanf("%d", &i);
      v3[vs++] = i;
    }
 
   temp = power(vs);
   if (size < temp) {
     te = 1;
     while (size > te) te <<= 1;
     for (k = size - te>>1; k < te; k++)
       v2[size+k] = v2[k] ^ 1;
     for (; k < temp; k<<=1) {
       for (i = k; i < (k<<1); i++)
         v2[i] = v2[i-k] ^ 1;
     }
   } 
 
    if (v3[0] == 1) { 
      printf("1 ");
      t = 1;
    }
    else  {
      printf("0 ");
      t = 0;
    }
 
    if (vs == 1) { 
      putchar('\n');
      continue;
    }
 
    i = 1;
 
 
    while (i < vs) {
      k = power(i+1) - i;
      while (t < k) {
        for (temp = 0; temp < i+1; temp++) {
          if (v3[temp] != v2[temp+t]) break;
          if (temp == i) {
            printf("%d ", t);
            i++;
            if (i >= vs) break;
            k = power(i+1) - i;
          }
        }
        if (i >= vs) break;
        t++;
      }
 
      if (t >= k) {
        while (i < vs) {
          printf("-1 ");
          i++;
        }
        break;
      }
      i++;
    }
    putchar('\n');
  }
 
  return 0;
}
